articles.title: This startup helps plants talk to farmers, reducing pesticides and agricultural waste - CNBC
articles.description: InnerPlant's technology uses fluorescents in the plants, so the leaves emit a signal when they are in distress.
articles.content:
What if plants could talk to farmers and tell them when they're distressed? That would not only help the plants but also reduce the amount of agricultural waste that threatens the planet's health.
